argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_axicn | |- _i e. CC |
| 2 |  | #P_mulneg12 | |- ( ( _i e. CC /\ A e. CC ) -> ( -u _i x. A ) = ( _i x. -u A ) ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_mpan | |- ( A e. CC -> ( -u _i x. A ) = ( _i x. -u A ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_eqcomd | |- ( A e. CC -> ( _i x. -u A ) = ( -u _i x. A ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( A e. CC -> ( exp ` ( _i x. -u A ) ) = ( exp ` ( -u _i x. A ) ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_mul2neg | |- ( ( _i e. CC /\ A e. CC ) -> ( -u _i x. -u A ) = ( _i x. A ) ) |
| 7 | 1, 6 | #P_mpan | |- ( A e. CC -> ( -u _i x. -u A ) = ( _i x. A ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( A e. CC -> ( exp ` ( -u _i x. -u A ) ) = ( exp ` ( _i x. A ) ) ) |
| 9 | 5, 8 | #P_oveq12d | |- ( A e. CC -> ( ( exp ` ( _i x. -u A ) ) + ( exp ` ( -u _i x. -u A ) ) ) = ( ( exp ` ( -u _i x. A ) ) + ( exp ` ( _i x. A ) ) ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_negicn | |- -u _i e. CC |
| 11 |  | #P_mulcl | |- ( ( -u _i e. CC /\ A e. CC ) -> ( -u _i x. A ) e. CC ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_mpan | |- ( A e. CC -> ( -u _i x. A ) e. CC ) |
| 13 |  | #P_efcl | |- ( ( -u _i x. A ) e. CC -> ( exp ` ( -u _i x. A ) ) e. CC ) |
| 14 | 12, 13 | #P_syl | |- ( A e. CC -> ( exp ` ( -u _i x. A ) ) e. CC ) |
| 15 |  | #P_mulcl | |- ( ( _i e. CC /\ A e. CC ) -> ( _i x. A ) e. CC ) |
| 16 | 1, 15 | #P_mpan | |- ( A e. CC -> ( _i x. A ) e. CC ) |
| 17 |  | #P_efcl | |- ( ( _i x. A ) e. CC -> ( exp ` ( _i x. A ) ) e. CC ) |
| 18 | 16, 17 | #P_syl | |- ( A e. CC -> ( exp ` ( _i x. A ) ) e. CC ) |
| 19 | 14, 18 | #P_addcomd | |- ( A e. CC -> ( ( exp ` ( -u _i x. A ) ) + ( exp ` ( _i x. A ) ) ) = ( ( exp ` ( _i x. A ) ) + ( exp ` ( -u _i x. A ) ) ) ) |
| 20 | 9, 19 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( A e. CC -> ( ( exp ` ( _i x. -u A ) ) + ( exp ` ( -u _i x. -u A ) ) ) = ( ( exp ` ( _i x. A ) ) + ( exp ` ( -u _i x. A ) ) ) ) |
| 21 | 20 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( A e. CC -> ( ( ( exp ` ( _i x. -u A ) ) + ( exp ` ( -u _i x. -u A ) ) ) / 2 ) = ( ( ( exp ` ( _i x. A ) ) + ( exp ` ( -u _i x. A ) ) ) / 2 ) ) |
| 22 |  | #P_negcl | |- ( A e. CC -> -u A e. CC ) |
| 23 |  | #P_cosval | |- ( -u A e. CC -> ( cos ` -u A ) = ( ( ( exp ` ( _i x. -u A ) ) + ( exp ` ( -u _i x. -u A ) ) ) / 2 ) ) |
| 24 | 22, 23 | #P_syl | |- ( A e. CC -> ( cos ` -u A ) = ( ( ( exp ` ( _i x. -u A ) ) + ( exp ` ( -u _i x. -u A ) ) ) / 2 ) ) |
| 25 |  | #P_cosval | |- ( A e. CC -> ( cos ` A ) = ( ( ( exp ` ( _i x. A ) ) + ( exp ` ( -u _i x. A ) ) ) / 2 ) ) |
| 26 | 21, 24, 25 | #P_3eqtr4d | |- ( A e. CC -> ( cos ` -u A ) = ( cos ` A ) ) |
